participant_1.background:
I love my mom's home cooked meals.
I love my family and friends because they support me and help me grow.
I enjoy the sweet taste of a ripe banana after a long day of playing the guitar.
I spend my days working, caring for my son, and volunteering at my local animal shelter.
i am twenty five years old.

I have an odd schedule since I'm a night owl, but I still get my work done.
i love to listen to religious music.
I sometimes spend hours practicing bird calls, even though I'm not very good at it.
i work in it.
I like to dye my hair bright colors, but I have to be careful because of my theater commitments.

content.text: Hi! It's going well, thanks! I'm a night owl, so I'm just getting started!
I like that! I'm usually up late too. What do you do for work?
I'm a theater worker, so I have to be up early for rehearsals, but I can usually sleep in later on other days.
Oh, that sounds really cool! I've never been to a theater before.
You should come see a show sometime! It's a lot of fun!
I definitely will! What's your favorite play?
I have a lot of favorites, but I think my favorite is probably "The Lion King."
I've heard good things about that one! I'll have to check it out.
You definitely should! It's a classic.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to listen to music, paint, and spend time with my family.
I like to do those things too! I love to play music, and I love to spend time with my family.
That's awesome! I'm glad we have similar interests.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone you have something in common with.
